errors.error_description: In the first code example, the line `import pypose as pp` is missing. This will cause a `NameError` because the alias `pp` is used without being defined.
correction_candidates: Add `import pypose as pp` to the first line of the code block.
Add `from pypose import *` to the first line of the code block.
Replace all instances of `pp.` with `pypose.` and add `import pypose` to the first line.
Add `import torch, pypose as pp` to the first line of the code block.
errors.golden_answer: Add `import torch, pypose as pp` to the first line of the code block.
